How to Acquire Speak with Animals

Speak with Animals can be acquired by the following classes:

Bard Druid Ranger Warlock (Beast Speech invocation) Wildheart (Barbarian) Oath of the Ancients (Paladin) Nature Domain (Cleric)

Speak with Animals can be cast by using the following Items:

Potion of Animal Speaking

Speak with Animals can be acquired by the following Races:
